mainEntity.name: What is Opulus and how does it work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Opulus is a platform that integrates music IPs with blockchain, allowing users to tokenize music royalties as NFTs. It leverages decentralized finance (DeFi) to provide a marketplace for selling music-related NFTs, offering unique investment opportunities through music royalties.

mainEntity.name: Why should I sell Opulus NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Selling Opulus NFTs allows you to monetize music assets by transforming tracks into NFTs, engage with fans by offering them ownership of music pieces, and earn passive income through music royalties.

mainEntity.name: How do I set up an account for selling Opulus NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: To set up an account, create a digital wallet using options like Metamask, Trust Wallet, or WalletConnect. Connect your wallet to the Opulus website and complete the necessary KYC processes.

mainEntity.name: What steps are involved in creating and listing an Opulus NFT?

acceptedAnswer.text: Begin by tokenizing your music: upload your music for tokenization and mint the NFT, setting details such as royalties. Then set pricing and terms for your NFT, choosing between fixed pricing or auctions and researching market trends for optimal pricing.

mainEntity.name: How can I promote my Opulus NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: Promote your NFTs by leveraging social media platforms like Twitter, Instagram, and TikTok to increase visibility. Engage with the community on Opulus forums and social media, and consider paid promotions using Facebook Ads or Google Ads for targeted marketing.

mainEntity.name: What should I do during and after the execution of an Opulus NFT sale?

acceptedAnswer.text: During the sale, monitor offers and bids, especially in auctions. Afterward, engage with buyers to build relationships for future sales, reinvest profits in creating new content or other investments, and stay updated on industry trends and Opulus developments.
